title: Father and Son - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Adultery   Arrogant Characters   Betrayal   Businessmen   Cohabitation   Cold Protagonist   Complex Family Relationships   Contracts   Couple Growth   Cute Children   Death   Death of Loved Ones   Depression   Familial Love   Fated Lovers   Forced into a Relationship   Futuristic Setting   Generals   Hard-Working Protagonist   Manipulative Characters   Manly Gay Couple   Marriage of Convenience   Military   Misunderstandings   Mpreg   Multiple POV   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Older Love Interests   Pretend Lovers   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Revenge   Second Chance   Seme Protagonist   Servants   Strong Love Interests   Suicides   Tragic Past   Tsundere   Wealthy Characters   Younger Love Interests
author: Chen Qimo   陈七默
description:
When his world was shattered, he was left with nothing but despair

In the era of men and men, men can also get pregnant

Li Xiao married Cheng Mu, envy of other people because they are together just because of a good partner

But their world changed when there was no news from his stomach

Li Xiao was forced to have a relationship with his father-in-law in order to carry on the family lineage

It turns out that there are many things, not only together is wonderful…

The days of self-deception, whether or not the day is ended.>
